effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to [catch]{mechanic:catch} a wild Pokémon.  Has a catch rate of 1.1× on the first turn of the battle and increases by 0.1× every turn, to a maximum of 4× on turn 30.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate increases by 0.1× (Gen V: 0.3×) every turn, to a max of 4×.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ターン数が　かかれば　かかるほど
ポケモンが　捕まえやすくなる
ちょっと　変わった　ボール。

A somewhat different Poké Ball that
becomes progressively more effective
the more turns that are taken in battle.

Poké Ball un po’ diversa che diventa
progressivamente più efficace con l’aumentare
dei turni in lotta.

Una Poké Ball algo distinta que va mejorando
su rendimiento con cada turno de combate.

Ein Ball, der mit zunehmender Kampfdauer
effektiver wird.

Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui fonctionne
de mieux en mieux à mesure que le combat
s’éternise.

턴 수가 길어지면 길어질수록
포켓몬을 잡기 쉬운
조금 특이한 볼.

ターンすうが　かかれば　かかるほど
ポケモンが　つかまえやすくなる
ちょっと　かわった　ボール。

A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

Une Poké Ball un peu spéciale qui
fonctionne de mieux en mieux à
mesure que le combat s’éternise.

A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

A somewhat different Ball that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

A somewhat different BALL that
becomes progressively better the
more turns there are in a battle.

A BALL that gains
power in battles
taking many turns.

More effective as
more turns are
taken in battle.
